text: Yvan Serge "The Roadrunner" Cournoyer (born November 22, 1943) is a retired Canadian hockey right winger who played in the National Hockey League for the Montreal Canadiens from 1963 to 1979. Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Conn Smythe Trophy winners Category:Hockey Hall of Fame inductees Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Stanley Cup champions
title: Yvan Cournoyer
